titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Hexane, 1,6-dichloro-.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 2/6/2008--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend temporarily the duty on Hexane, 1,6-dichloro-.
